io.nats.connector.plugin

Interface NATSConnectorPlugin


  • public interface NATSConnectorPlugin
    This interface that must be implemented for a NATS Connector plugin.

    The order of calls are:

    onStartup

    onNatsIntialized

    During operation: onNatsMessage and onNATSEvent

    onShutdown

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onNATSEvent(NATSEvent event, String message)
      Invoked anytime a NATS event occurs around a connection or error, alerting the plugin to take appropriate action.
      boolean onNatsInitialized(NATSConnector connector)
      Invoked after startup, when the NATS plug-in has connectivity to the NATS cluster, and is ready to start sending and and receiving messages.
      void onNATSMessage(io.nats.client.Message msg)
      Invoked anytime a NATS message is received to be processed.
      void onShutdown()
      Invoked when the Plugin is shutting down.
      boolean onStartup(org.slf4j.Logger logger, io.nats.client.ConnectionFactory factory)
      Invoked when the connector is started up, before a connection to the NATS cluster is made.

    • Method Detail

      • onStartup

        boolean onStartup(org.slf4j.Logger logger,
                  io.nats.client.ConnectionFactory factory)
        Invoked when the connector is started up, before a connection to the NATS cluster is made. The NATS connection factory is valid at this time, providing an opportunity to alter NATS connection parameters based on other plugin variables.
        Parameters:
        logger - - logger for the NATS connector process.
        factory - - the NATS connection factory.
        Returns:
        - true if the connector should continue, false otherwise.

      • onNatsInitialized

        boolean onNatsInitialized(NATSConnector connector)
        Invoked after startup, when the NATS plug-in has connectivity to the NATS cluster, and is ready to start sending and and receiving messages. This is the place to create NATS subscriptions.
        Parameters:
        connector - interface to the NATS connector
        Returns:
        true if the plugin can continue.

      • onNATSMessage

        void onNATSMessage(io.nats.client.Message msg)
        Invoked anytime a NATS message is received to be processed.
        Parameters:
        msg - - NATS message received.

      • onNATSEvent

        void onNATSEvent(NATSEvent event,
                 String message)
        Invoked anytime a NATS event occurs around a connection or error, alerting the plugin to take appropriate action. For example, when NATS is reconnecting, buffer or pause incoming data to be sent to NATS.
        Parameters:
        event - the type of event
        message - a string describing the event

      • onShutdown

        void onShutdown()
        Invoked when the Plugin is shutting down. This is typically where plugin resources are cleaned up.
